headline.main: GENERAL NOW A COLONEL; Vuillemin Asked de Gaulle for Lower Rank and Combat Duty

abstract: French mil: de Gaulle appts Gen Vuillemin lt col commanding Tunis Bretagne air group on latter's request
snippet: French mil: de Gaulle appts Gen Vuillemin lt col commanding Tunis Bretagne air group on latter's request...

byline.original: Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES
